featured.text: The hard hat was invented in 1919 by Edward W. Bullard, who had just returned from World War I. Before the war, workers used to smear their hats with coal tar for protection of their head.

definition.zh_def: 塗抹；抹上（某物）以形成污漬或斑點。
definition.en_def: To spread or apply a substance, often in a messy or uneven way.
definition.example: She decided to smear some sunscreen on her face before going to the beach.
